verses.verse: <S%H116>Then<s%> <S%H1868>Darius<s%> the <S%H4430>king<s%> <S%H7761>made<s%> a <S%H2942>decree,<s%> and <S%H1240>search<s%> was made in the <S%H1005>house<s%> of the <S%H5609>rolls,<s%> <S%H8536>where<s%> the <S%H1596>treasures<s%> were <S%H5182>laid<s%> up in <S%H895>Babylon.<s%>

And there was <S%H7912>found<s%> at <S%H307>Achmetha,<s%> in the <S%H1002>palace<s%> that is in the <S%H4082>province<s%> of the <S%H4074>Medes,<s%> a <S%H4040>roll,<s%> and <S%H1459>therein<s%> was a <S%H1799>record<s%> <S%H3652>thus<s%> <S%H3790>written:<s%>

In the <S%H2298>first<s%> <S%H8140>year<s%> of <S%H3567>Cyrus<s%> the <S%H4430>king<s%> the same <S%H3567>Cyrus<s%> the <S%H4430>king<s%> <S%H7761>made<s%> a <S%H2942>decree<s%> concerning the <S%H1005>house<s%> of <S%H426>God<s%> at <S%H3390>Jerusalem,<s%> Let the <S%H1005>house<s%> be <S%H1124>built,<s%> the <S%H870>place<s%> <S%H1768>where<s%> they <S%H1684>offered<s%> <S%H1685>sacrifices,<s%> and let the <S%H787>foundations<s%> thereof be strongly <S%H5446>laid;<s%> the <S%H7312>height<s%> thereof three <S%H8361>score<s%> <S%H521>cubits,<s%> and the <S%H6613>breadth<s%> thereof three <S%H8361>score<s%> <S%H521>cubits;<s%>

With <S%H8532>three<s%> <S%H5073>rows<s%> of <S%H1560>great<s%> <S%H69>stones,<s%> and a <S%H5073>row<s%> of <S%H2323>new<s%> <S%H636>timber:<s%> and let the <S%H5313>expenses<s%> be <S%H3052>given<s%> out of the <S%H4430>king's<s%> <S%H1005>house:<s%>

And <S%H638>also<s%> let the <S%H1722>golden<s%> and <S%H3702>silver<s%> <S%H3984>vessels<s%> of the <S%H1005>house<s%> of <S%H426>God,<s%> <S%H1768>which<s%> <S%H5020>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H5312>took<s%> <S%H5312>forth<s%> out of the <S%H1965>temple<s%> which is at <S%H3390>Jerusalem,<s%> and <S%H2987>brought<s%> to <S%H895>Babylon,<s%> be <S%H8421>restored,<s%> and <S%H1946>brought<s%> <S%H1946>again<s%> to the <S%H1965>temple<s%> <S%H1768>which<s%> is at <S%H3390>Jerusalem,<s%> every one to his <S%H870>place,<s%> and <S%H5182>place<s%> them in the <S%H1005>house<s%> of <S%H426>God.<s%>

<S%H3705>Now<s%> therefore, <S%H8674>Tatnai,<s%> <S%H6347>governor<s%> <S%H5675>beyond<s%> the <S%H5103>river,<s%> <S%H8370>Shetharboznai,<s%> and your <S%H3675>companions<s%> the <S%H671>Apharsachites,<s%> <S%H1768>which<s%> are <S%H5675>beyond<s%> the <S%H5103>river,<s%> be you <S%H7352>far<s%> from <S%H8536>there:<s%>

Let the <S%H5673>work<s%> of <S%H1791>this<s%> <S%H1005>house<s%> of <S%H426>God<s%> <S%H7662>alone;<s%> let the <S%H6347>governor<s%> of the <S%H3062>Jews<s%> and the <S%H7868>elders<s%> of the <S%H3062>Jews<s%> <S%H1124>build<s%> <S%H1791>this<s%> <S%H1005>house<s%> of <S%H426>God<s%> in his <S%H870>place.<s%>

Moreover I <S%H7761>make<s%> a <S%H2942>decree<s%> <S%H3964>what<s%> <S%H1768><s%> you shall <S%H5648>do<s%> to the <S%H7868>elders<s%> of <S%H479>these<s%> <S%H3062>Jews<s%> for the <S%H1124>building<s%> of <S%H1791>this<s%> <S%H1005>house<s%> of <S%H426>God:<s%> that of the <S%H4430>king's<s%> <S%H5232>goods,<s%> even of the <S%H4061>tribute<s%> <S%H5675>beyond<s%> the <S%H5103>river,<s%> <S%H629>immediately<s%> <S%H5313>expenses<s%> be <S%H3052>given<s%> to <S%H479>these<s%> <S%H1400>men,<s%> that they be not <S%H989>hindered.<s%>

And that which they have <S%H2818>need<s%> of, both <S%H1123>young<s%> <S%H8450>bullocks,<s%> and <S%H1798>rams,<s%> and <S%H563>lambs,<s%> for the <S%H5928>burnt<s%> offerings of the <S%H426>God<s%> of <S%H8065>heaven,<s%> <S%H2591>wheat,<s%> <S%H4416>salt,<s%> <S%H2562>wine,<s%> and <S%H4887>oil,<s%> according to the <S%H3983>appointment<s%> of the <S%H3549>priests<s%> <S%H1768>which<s%> are at <S%H3390>Jerusalem,<s%> let it be <S%H3052>given<s%> them <S%H3118>day<s%> by <S%H3118>day<s%> without <S%H7960>fail:<s%>

That they may <S%H7127>offer<s%> sacrifices of <S%H5208>sweet<s%> <S%H5208>smells<s%> to the <S%H426>God<s%> of <S%H8065>heaven,<s%> and <S%H6739>pray<s%> for the <S%H2417>life<s%> of the <S%H4430>king,<s%> and of his <S%H1123>sons.<s%>

Also I have <S%H7761>made<s%> a <S%H2942>decree,<s%> that <S%H3605>whoever<s%> shall <S%H8133>alter<s%> <S%H1836>this<s%> <S%H6600>word,<s%> let <S%H636>timber<s%> be <S%H5256>pulled<s%> down from his <S%H1005>house,<s%> and being <S%H2211>set<s%> up, let him be <S%H4223>hanged<s%> <S%H5921>thereon;<s%> and let his <S%H1005>house<s%> be <S%H5648>made<s%> a <S%H5122>dunghill<s%> for <S%H1836>this.<s%>

And the <S%H426>God<s%> that has caused his <S%H8036>name<s%> to <S%H7932>dwell<s%> <S%H8536>there<s%> <S%H4049>destroy<s%> <S%H3606>all<s%> <S%H4430>kings<s%> and <S%H5972>people,<s%> that shall <S%H7972>put<s%> to their <S%H3028>hand<s%> to <S%H8133>alter<s%> and to <S%H2255>destroy<s%> <S%H1791>this<s%> <S%H1005>house<s%> of <S%H426>God<s%> <S%H1768>which<s%> is at <S%H3390>Jerusalem.<s%> I <S%H1868>Darius<s%> have <S%H7761>made<s%> a <S%H2942>decree;<s%> let it be <S%H5648>done<s%> with <S%H629>speed.<s%>

<S%H116>Then<s%> <S%H8674>Tatnai,<s%> <S%H6347>governor<s%> on this <S%H5675>side<s%> the <S%H5103>river,<s%> <S%H8370>Shetharboznai,<s%> and their <S%H3675>companions,<s%> <S%H6903>according<s%> to that <S%H1768>which<s%> <S%H1868>Darius<s%> the <S%H4430>king<s%> had <S%H7972>sent,<s%> <S%H3660>so<s%> they did <S%H629>speedily.<s%>

And the <S%H7868>elders<s%> of the <S%H3062>Jews<s%> <S%H1124>built,<s%> and they <S%H6744>prospered<s%> through the <S%H5017>prophesying<s%> of <S%H2292>Haggai<s%> the <S%H5029>prophet<s%> and <S%H2148>Zechariah<s%> the <S%H1247>son<s%> of <S%H5714>Iddo.<s%> And they <S%H1124>built,<s%> and <S%H3635>finished<s%> it, <S%H4481>according<s%> to the <S%H2941>commandment<s%> of the <S%H426>God<s%> of <S%H3479>Israel,<s%> and according to the <S%H2942>commandment<s%> of <S%H3567>Cyrus,<s%> and <S%H1868>Darius,<s%> and <S%H783>Artaxerxes<s%> <S%H4430>king<s%> of <S%H6540>Persia.<s%>

And <S%H1836>this<s%> <S%H1005>house<s%> was <S%H3319>finished<s%> <S%H5705>on<s%> the <S%H8531>third<s%> <S%H3118>day<s%> of the <S%H3393>month<s%> <S%H144>Adar,<s%> <S%H1768>which<s%> was in the <S%H8353>sixth<s%> <S%H8140>year<s%> of the <S%H4437>reign<s%> of <S%H1868>Darius<s%> the <S%H4430>king.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3479>Israel,<s%> the <S%H3549>priests,<s%> and the <S%H3879>Levites,<s%> and the <S%H7606>rest<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H1547>captivity,<s%> <S%H5648>kept<s%> the <S%H2597>dedication<s%> of <S%H1836>this<s%> <S%H1005>house<s%> of <S%H426>God<s%> with <S%H2305>joy.<s%>

And <S%H7127>offered<s%> at the <S%H2597>dedication<s%> of <S%H1836>this<s%> <S%H1005>house<s%> of <S%H426>God<s%> an <S%H3969>hundred<s%> <S%H8450>bullocks,<s%> two <S%H3969>hundred<s%> <S%H1798>rams,<s%> <S%H703>four<s%> <S%H3969>hundred<s%> <S%H563>lambs;<s%> and for a <S%H2409>sin<s%> offering for <S%H3606>all<s%> <S%H3479>Israel,<s%> <S%H8648>twelve<s%> <S%H6236><s%> he <S%H5796>goats,<s%> according to the <S%H4510>number<s%> of the <S%H7625>tribes<s%> of <S%H3479>Israel.<s%>

And they <S%H6966>set<s%> the <S%H3549>priests<s%> in their <S%H6392>divisions,<s%> and the <S%H3879>Levites<s%> in their <S%H4255>courses,<s%> for the <S%H5673>service<s%> of <S%H426>God,<s%> <S%H1768>which<s%> is at <S%H3390>Jerusalem;<s%> as it is <S%H3792>written<s%> in the <S%H5609>book<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H1473>captivity<s%> <S%H6213>kept<s%> the <S%H6453>passover<s%> on the <S%H702>fourteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> day of the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month.<s%>

For the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> were <S%H2891>purified<s%> <S%H259>together,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> of them were <S%H2889>pure,<s%> and <S%H7819>killed<s%> the <S%H6453>passover<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H1473>captivity,<s%> and for their <S%H251>brothers<s%> the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> and for <S%H1992>themselves.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> which were <S%H7725>come<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> out of <S%H1473>captivity,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> such as had <S%H6395>separated<s%> themselves to them from the <S%H2932>filthiness<s%> of the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> to <S%H1875>seek<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> did <S%H398>eat,<s%>

And <S%H6213>kept<s%> the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> bread <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> with <S%H8057>joy:<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had made them <S%H8055>joyful,<s%> and <S%H5437>turned<s%> the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%> to them, to <S%H2388>strengthen<s%> their <S%H3027>hands<s%> in the <S%H4399>work<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
